participant_1.background:
I don't dye my hair, because I like my natural color.
My family is very supportive and encouraging
My parents were always busy with work, so I had to get a job early to help make ends meet.
I enjoyed going to the theater this weekend and watching a play with my family.
I love watching Gila chase the sunbeams around my living room.

participant_2.background:
I'm not interested in sharing details about my personal life.
I am still trying to lose weight.
i love to keep a small garden outside of my house.
I am from the Midwest, where we love our sweet treats and hip hop.
I cherish my camera because it allows me to express my creativity.

content.text: I'm doing well! I just got done watching a play at the theater with my family. It was really good.
Nice! I'm glad to hear that. I love going to the theater. Do you have any other hobbies?
Yes, I love to cook and bake. I also love to spend time with my cat, Gila.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love to cook too. I'm also trying to lose weight, so I've been eating a lot healthier.
That's good for you! I'm not trying to lose weight, but I do try to eat healthy.
Do you have any favorite foods?
I love all kinds of food! I especially love Mexican food.
Me too! I love tacos, burritos, and enchiladas.
Me too! I also love tamales.
I've never had tamales. I'll have to try them sometime.
I'm sure they are! I'm glad we had this conversation. I'm hungry now!
Me too! I'm going to go make some tamales.
Have fun! I'm going to go make some tacos.
